title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Wednesday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Wednesday

Find some awesome stuff on Amazon for great prices this Wednesday. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Not every deal on Amazon is going to be a good one. So we go through the offerings every day to find the absolute best bang for your buck on the absolute highest quality products. We look at our own test results as well as customer reviews and price histories to determine if a deal is actually as good as it seems or if its better to avoid. These are the five best things to buy on Amazon this Wednesday.

1. Lowest price since Prime Day: Award-winning true wireless earbuds

These are the best choice if you don't want Airpods. (Photo: Jabra / Reviewed)

Jabra's Elite 65t earbuds impressed our tester, who gave them our Editors' Choice award. The long battery life, quality sound, and secure fit ranked them as comparable to the popular Apple Airpods, and right now they're down to the best price we've seen since Prime Day, when they reached $120. They are a bit bulky, as most high-end non-Apple options tend to be, so might not be the most comfortable for extended use. But for $36 less than usual, this is an impeccable investment if you wear headphones all the time and hate dealing with cords.

Get the Jabra Elite 65t True Wireless Earbuds for $133.99 (Save $36)

2. Under $30: A USB-C hub with every port you'll need

The dongle life is not that bad when you've got a good hub. (Photo: Anker)

If you have a new Macbook, you know the pain of needing to plug something in and not having a USB-C cable to do so. If you're living that dongle life, this Anker hub is the perfect solution. Right now it's only $29, down from $40, with the code ANKER665. You get two USB-C ports (one charges, one transmits data), two USB-A ports, a microSD slot and an SD card slot, and an HDMI port that's capable of transmitting 4K picture.

Get the Anker 7-in-1 USB C Adapter for $28.99 (Save $11) with the code ANKER665

3. Under $140: The Instant Pot that talks to Alexa

The WiFi connectivity is a perk on this already amazing device. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Everyone loves the Instant Pot, but if you really want to upgrade your pressure cooking game, you're going to want to get the Instant Pot Smart WiFi. It's one of the best electric multi-cookers we've ever tested because it was the most efficient, precise, and intuitive model. It comes with a wonderful app that lets you control your cooking from anywhere in your home and choose from pre-programmed recipes, but you can still use the buttons if you're so inclined. And if you want to put in even less effort, it works with Alexa.

Get the Instant Pot Smart WiFi 6 Quart for $133.24 (Save $16.71)

4. Under $125: The best Fitbit

The Charge 3 is worth it for the lengthy battery life alone, never mind the other awesome features. (Photo: Reviewed.com)

The Fitbit Charge 3 is back on sale! Whenever this $150 fitness tracker drops in price, it always drops to $120. This discount on the best fitness tracker we've ever tested is the perfect excuse to take the plunge. These things track your heart rate and your steps, but they also let you get text, calendar, call, and app notifications on your wrist. And did I mention they actually have an impressive battery life? When I first got mine the battery lasted anywhere from eight to 10 days and I was blown away, especially because they advertise it as seven days. Plus, the Fitbit app and their customer service are both really fantastic.

Get the Fitbit Charge 3 for $119.95 (Save $30)

5. Under $40: The Amazon Fire Stick for easier streaming

These Alexa-compatible Fire Sticks are some of the biggest sellers this Prime Day. (Photo: Amazon)

You don't need a massive cable bill to watch all your favorite shows. You already subscribe to Netflix and Hulu at least,. and if you're a Prime member, you have to check out Prime Video. Right now, you can cut the cable and get one of the best streaming devices for the best price it's been all year. The best part? There's a button for Alexa so you can use your voice to search for the shows you want to watch—way better than clunky on-screen keyboards.

Get the Amazon Fire Stick Streaming Device with 4K for $34.99 (Save $15)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
